rules.name: Client Name Verification
rules.description: Verify that all occurrences of the client name in the report match EXACTLY the client name provided by the user, with no misspellings, variations, or inconsistencies. Case-sensitive matching is required.

rules.name: Audit Period Verification
rules.description: Verify that the audit period (start and end dates) mentioned anywhere in the report matches EXACTLY the dates provided by the user. Any discrepancy or inconsistency in dates will be flagged with specific locations in the document.
